channel.title: Authors on Container Registry
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Container Registry

item.title: Rahul Sharma
item.description: A seasoned developer with experience in various languages like Java, Python, Groovy, Angular. I have worked across various domains live travel, master-data-management, product startups, investment bank etc. I am an open source addict working with Apache Software Foundation @ Apache Crunch and Apache HDT. There has been contributions(of varying scale) to various open source libraries like Mahout, Provisionr, maven lucene plugin, Neo4j etc. I have been sharing technical thoughts at various meetups.

item.title: Vadim Bauer
item.description: SaaS Builder, Explorer, Cloud First, and DevOps advocate and practitioner! Founder @container-registry @8gears @z-invoice @konik-io to name a few. Vivid OSS Contributor.

item.title: Yong Wei Lun
item.description: I work with golang, kubernetes and explore and write about #cloud, #golang, #kubernetes, #opensource and #cloudnative
